alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:27AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Passaic, Bergen, northwestern Essex, southern Westchester and Rockland Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 527 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wayne, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, Paterson, Passaic, Wayne, Hackensack, New City, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ossining, Ridgewood, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey, Haverstraw and Tarrytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen; Western Essex
